2 Multicollinearity

See if multicollinearity is an issue. If so, how do you want to deal with it?

Code 
cars2010.1 <- cars2010[, -c(2, 10)]
collin.test <- lm(FE ~ ., data = cars2010.1)
vif(collin.test)
                          GVIF Df GVIF^(1/(2*Df))
